title: Riot please check this person out asap
body:
I have played a few games with this guy _name removed_  and he is a serious creeper... I think he's some old guy that hasn't heard of Tinder and tries to chat up people with 'female' sound names. 

Please please check him out and he'll surely create a new account so if you can do further searching or whatever you do but he doesn't even play properly and it extra sucks as he is playing ranked all the time!

replies.body:
Please do not report players on the boards, [it is against the rules](http://Please create a max of 1 ticket about this issue, and do not try to add any information afterwards/submit multiple as it will bump it to the back of the queue. It can take up to 7 business days for them to get back to you, so be patient. Also, please keep in mind that Riot can not tell you if the players receive a punishment, nor go into detail about their potential punishments due to privacy reasons, but rest assured that they will look into it.). 

If you have issues with this player being a "creeper", please utilise the in-game report feature (although not sure if would pick up creeping), or send in a s[upport ticket to Riot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), detailing as much as you can. 

Please create a max of 1 ticket about this issue, and do not try to add any information afterwards/submit multiple as it will bump it to the back of the queue. It can take up to 7 business days for them to get back to you, so be patient. Also, please keep in mind that Riot can not tell you if the players receive a punishment, nor go into detail about their potential punishments due to privacy reasons, but rest assured that they will look into it.
